meanings.definition: A rare inherited disorder characterized by a lack of gamma globulins in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Children with agammaglobulinemias may have weakened immune systems.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can diagnose agammaglobulinemias through blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The party clown joked that his agammaglobulinemias made him immune to silly string attacks.
meanings.sent4: Her agammaglobulinemias was a shield against common infections.
meanings.sent5: The absence of gamma globulins in agammaglobulinemias is like having a broken armor in a battle.
